Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Patient 1 was found to be a compound heterozygote for two mutations in exon 3 ( G7013T , C7133delta ) which interfere with appropriate synthesis of ACTH and alpha - MSH .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| G7013T |
| C7133delta |
| ACTH |
| alpha - MSH |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| G7013T |
| C7133delta |

I removed "ACTH" and "alpha - MSH" from the list as they are not diseases, but rather hormones and proteins that are affected by the mutations mentioned in the paragraph.
